title: Air Conditioning, Great Neighborhood, Spacious Floor Plans
posting_body: ['Welcome home to Sunset Ridge', 'Welcome home to Sunset Ridge, where convenience and comfort maximize your daily routine.', 'Our apartments in Denver, CO, have everything you need to step into a life of ease in a place that instantly feels like home.', 'With close access to a variety of restaurants, shops, parks, and entertainment, you can step into the local lifestyle right outside your door.', 'Here, the perfect combination of nature and contemporary city life is yours.', 'Spend afternoons and weekends exploring Centennial Park, Sheridan Community Park, or all Denver and the surrounding area have to offer.', 'Grab a bite or your favorite brew at Nixon’s Coffee House, Monaghan’s Bar and Grill, or Mike’s Cafe, and fall in love with our thriving community.', 'Come home to Sunset Ridge and come home to better living.', 'Schedule a tour today!', 'Call Now:', 'show contact info', 'x 14', 'OR Text', '14', 'to', 'show contact info', 'to text our team.', 'Want more info?', 'See the link below:', '<URL>', 'This is a 2 Bedroom, 1 Bath, approximately 700 Sq.', 'Ft.', 'Features', '- Fully Equipped Kitchens', '- Spacious Floor Plans', '- Air Conditioning', 'Community Amenities', '- Great Neighborhood', '- Professional & Responsive Management', '- Conveniently Located Close to Local Dining, Shopping, & Entertainment', '- Beautiful Landscaping', 'Office Hours', 'By Appointment', 'Sunset Ridge', '4100 S Hooker Street, Denver, CO, 80236', 'Prices are subject to change, based on availability and qualification of the applicant, additional fees may apply.', 'IG7gLNgnmf9']
